EmailTemplate.description: This template is used after the user has requested access to the portal
EmailTemplate.name: Vendor Registration Confirmation (en_US)
EmailTemplate.subject: Case #{!Case.CaseNumber} - Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for registering with the Beam Suntory Company Community. Your request is being reviewed and, upon approval, a username and necessary action items will be provided via email. If your request requires additional validation, an email notification will be sent.
Requests can take up to 2 business days to process; please check spam/junk email folders as needed.
Thank you,
Beam Suntory
{!Case.Thread_Id}
